Name: Direct
Note: pqrs: Zoom Position (0(wide)~0x4000(tele)) tuvw: Focus Position

Name: Reset
Note:
p: Preset Number (=0 to 128)
Corresponds to 0-9 on the remote controller

Name: Set
Note:
p: Preset Number (=0 to 128)
Corresponds to 0-9 on the remote controller

Name: Recall
Note:
p: Preset Number (=0 to 128)
Corresponds to 0-9 on the remote controller

Name: Resolution
Note: pqrs: Column(x size) mnxy: Line (y size) only support: 1920x1080/1280x720

Name: Resolution
Note: pqrs : Column(x size) mnxy: Line (y size) only support: 1280x720/1024x576/640x360

Name: Off
Note: p: 0: OFF(LED off) 1: (LED green on) 2: (LED red on) 4: (LED blue on)

Name: Up
Note: VV: Pan speed 0x01 (low speed) to 0x18 (high speed)

Name: Left
Note: WW: Tilt speed 0x01 (low speed) to 0x14 (high speed)

Name: Upleft
Note: YYYY: Pan Position(TBD) ZZZZ: Tilt Position(TBD)

Name: Reset
Note:
PW: 1: UpRight 0:DownLeft 
YYYY: Pan Limit Position(TBD) 
ZZZZ: Tilt Limit Position(TBD)
